DOC.brief_summary: A study determine bioequivalence PPD material versus Reference Standard .
DOC.brief_title: Equivalence Study Tuberculin Purified Protein Derivative Comparison With Reference Standard ( PPD-S2 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study multicenter , double-blind , active-controlled parallel-group study determine bioequivalence newly produce PPD material versus PPD-S2 detection male female subject current previously diagnose intrathoracic Mtb infection , document positive culture Mtb ( preferred method ) , primary care attend physician and/or subject 's current prior medical record ( ie , sensitivity determination ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males nonpregnant female age 18 60 year 2 . Documented PPD reactivity 5 21 mm past , document medical record . Selfreported PPD reactivity acc 3 . Give write informed consent participate 4 . Generally healthy , determined medical history target physical examination , indicate 5 . Possess 2 forearm free burn , scar , eczema , physical deformity , could impair injection study prepar 6 . Comprehension study requirement ; express availability require study period , include reading nomina 1 . Prior PPD test within past 30 day 2 . Subject childbearing potential unable use contraceptive ; plan pregnancy ; pregnant lactate 3 . History anaphylactic reaction , severe positive tuberculin reaction ( eg , ulceration , necrosis ) severe reaction PPD 4 . Subject receive Bacillus CalmetteGu√©rin ( BCG ) vaccination past , born live outside US child 5 . Presence condition may suppress TST reactivity
